title: Why So Lazy Riot? (Champion Updates)
body:
If you have new ideas for champions, why do you replace old ones instead of adding new?

Why do I have to lose my old Galio and Swain, etc?
2 of my favourite champs, just removed and replaced with a completely different champion.
It makes no sense.

Galio and Swain are both completely different champs to their pre-update identities, why are they updates instead of new champions?

Should I just give you a list of my favourite champs to play, so you can remove them all?

Should I just uninstall and find another game to play?

[PS] Swain was my top mastery point champion before the update.
Mao and Galio are both up there too, and they got there before the changes.
